_sText:
The Eight release of my Aperture Science series!

This is a very simple map I made using all I've learned in doing my Aperture Science Map series. It is a nonsymetrical map and its of small/medium size. This is to allow for a tight, fast action packed gun game game to happen.

I decided no to include actual portals because it could unbalance the game and because they take a lot of work to do, however if you think I should add them, I will on the next version release. So any feedback, I mean ALL feedback is encouraged

Developed by Eugenio 'Motanum' Roman
Bugs, comments, suggestions to agent_2114@hotmail.com

**If you take this map for your server online DONT FORGET TO SEND ME YOUR I.P. address so I CAN JOIN along!

Next instalment on my Aperture Science Series will hopefully be a pay load for team fortress 2! Any Ideas on other type of maps? tell me agent_2114@hotmail.com

Sponsored by ]HeLL[ Clan
"Born in Heaven, Living in ]HeLL["

See screenshots

Installation, just paste the all of the files in the ZIP on your maps folder for Counter Strike Source

Default should be Files\Steam\steamapps\Account_Name\Counter Strike Source\cstrike\maps
